alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 1:02PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou D`Arbonne At Lake D`Arbonne affecting Lincoln, Ouachita and Union Parishes. For the Bayou D`arbonne...including Lake Claiborne, Lake D`Arbonne... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou D`Arbonne At Lake D`Arbonne. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 83.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM CDT Sunday was 83.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 83.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 83.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 115 PM CDT.
